p: Eighteen healthy New Zealand rabbits of either gender, aged 7 months and weighing 2.3 ± 0.4 kg were provided and raised at 20°C at the Laboratory Animal Center of Jilin University in China (license No. SCXK-(Ji) 2008-0005). All experimental protocols were in strict accordance with the Guidance Suggestions for the Care and Use of Laboratory Animals issued by the Ministry of Science and Technology of China[ 21].
